    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="de">Technisher Kreislauf des Kalks</string>
            <string language="en">Technical cycle of lime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle technique de chaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo técnico do cal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo tecnico di calce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνικός κύκλος του ασβέστη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo técnico de la cal</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Die grafische Darstellung des technischen Kreislaufes des Kalkes soll durch vorgegebene Begriffe und chemische Formeln ergänzt werden.</string>
            <string language="en">Complete the diagram demonstrating the technical cycle of lime with the terms and chemical formulas provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kalk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Löschkalk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Mörtel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Branntkalk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Delete lime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mortars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Quicklime</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Terminez le diagramme démontrant le cycle 
technique de la chaux avec les limites et les formules de produit 
chimique fournies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termine o diagrama que demonstra o ciclo técnico
do cal com os termos e as fórmulas do produto químico fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Completi lo schema che dimostra il ciclo tecnico 
di calce con i termini e le formule del prodotto chimico forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ολοκληρώστε το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύοντας τον τεχνικό 
κύκλο του ασβέστη με τους όρους και τους χημικούς τύπους 
παρεχόμενους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termine el diagrama que demuestra el ciclo 
técnico de la cal con los términos y los fórmulas del producto 
químico proporcionados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaux d'effacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mortiers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaux vive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cal da supressão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Almofarizes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Areia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quicklime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calce di cancellazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mortai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sabbia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calce viva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασβέστης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγράψτε τον ασβέστη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
